tool_description: Records price data points to a time-series database for historical tracking and analysis.
error_messages: Invalid product_id: Product identifier cannot be empty or contain special characters.
Invalid price value: Price must be a positive number.
Invalid currency code: Use standard 3-letter currency codes (USD, EUR, etc.).
Invalid timestamp format: Use ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).
Database connection failed: Unable to connect to storage backend.
Duplicate entry: This exact price record already exists for the timestamp.
usage: Provide product_id, price, and currency to record a price data point. Timestamp defaults to current time if not specified.

record_id.description: Unique identifier for the recorded entry

success.description: Whether the record was successfully stored

timestamp.description: Final timestamp used for the record
